p: Both CMV + UK and Senegalese participants had significantly increased frequencies (up to 10-fold higher) of total CD4 + and CD8 + T cells lacking expression of CD27 and CD28 compared with CMV − participants ( Fig. 2, A–C). In some individuals, over 10% of CD4 + T cells and 50% of CD8 + T cells did not express either CD27 or CD28. The frequency of CD27 −CD28 − T cells was also increased within effector memory T cell populations in CMV + individuals ( Fig. 2, D and E).
